channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Divergent
channel.desc: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi, Mystery 2014 In the future when the world is divided upon traces, Tris finds that she is not belonging to any trace of them, which may threat her life. Will she be able to save herself and the beloved ones? Shailene Woodley, Theo James, Kate Winslet, Jai Courtney, Ashley Judd, Neil Burger, Evan Daugherty, Vanessa Taylor.
